TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ScrollViewer extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.

span.span: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个使内容能够在比其实际大小较小的区域中显示。A enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size. 时的内容不是完全可见显示滚动条，用户可以用于移动的内容区域的可见。When the content of the is not entirely visible, the displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible. 包括所有的内容的区域是程度。The area that includes all of the content of the is the extent. 可见区域是内容的视区。The visible area of the content is the viewport. 物理滚动用于按预设的物理增量（通常按以像素为单位声明的值）滚动内容。Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels. 逻辑滚动用于滚动到逻辑树中的下一项。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 物理滚动是大多数的默认滚动行为元素。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. 如果你包含大量的项，滚动性能可能会受到影响。If your contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected. 在这种情况下，设置到`true`。In this case, set to `true`. 这将导致内容视图，以在拖动时保持静态，并更新时，才发布。This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the and to update only when the is released. 因为的滚动栏元素元素的默认样式中定义的如果将应用到自定义样式，将不再显示滚动条。Because the scroll bars for a element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a . 滚动条必须定义中才会出现的自定义样式。Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear. ## 自定义 ScrollViewer 控件Customizing the ScrollViewer Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ScrollViewer 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建，其中包含一些文本和一个矩形。The following example creates a that contains some text and a rectangle. 仅在需要时，将显示滚动条。The scroll bars appear only when they are needed. 当您调整窗口的大小时，滚动条将出现并消失。When you resize the window, the scroll bars appear and disappear. [!code-cpp[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/CPP/ScrollViewer_wcp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/CSharp/ScrollViewer_wcp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/VisualBasic/ScrollViewer.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/XAML/Pane1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanContentScroll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanContentScroll : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the interface are allowed to scroll.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the interface are allowed to scroll.

value.span: 如果按逻辑单位; 滚动如果按物理单位滚动。

span.span: if the scrolls in terms of logical units; if the scrolls in terms of physical units.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的内容可以滚动方面物理单位或逻辑单元。Content in a can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units. 物理单元是与设备无关的像素。Physical units are device independent pixels. 用于逻辑单位滚动中的项。Logical units are used for scrolling items within an . 默认行为是使用物理单位滚动内容。The default behavior of the is to use physical units to scroll its content. 但是，在情况下，设置为`true`，可以使用逻辑单位滚动内容。However, in cases where the is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll. 例如， ， ，并继承自其他控件使用逻辑单位滚动。For example, , , and other controls that inherit from use logical units to scroll. 如果是`true`的值， ， ，并属性都是数字的项，而不是物理单位。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items, instead of physical units. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 物理滚动是大多数的默认滚动行为元素。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置使用代码的属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. [!code-csharp[scrollchangedeventargsLayout#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollchangedeventargsLayout/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[scrollchangedeventargsLayout#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollchangedeventargsLayout/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`true`，当用户释放滚动内容的。When is `true`, the content is scrolled when the user releases the of the . 当用户拖动，则值不会更改。When the user drags the , the value does not change. 当用户释放，更新为当前值。When the user releases the , updates to the current value. 当是`false`，当用户拖动滚动内容。When is `false`, the content is scrolled when the user drags the . 在这种情况下，也始终等于。In this case, is always equal to .

summary.span: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.

span.span: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.

value.span: 一个，表示滚动内容的水平偏移量。

span.span: A that represents the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个正值对应于左侧偏移的内容。A positive value corresponds to the content being offset to the left. 有效值为介于零和减去。Valid values are between zero and the minus the . 设备无关的像素中描述了返回的值。The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels. 从.NET Framework 版本 3.5 SP1 中，开始时是`true`，不断变化作为用户拖动，但内容视图不会更改直到发布。Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when is `true`, continues to change as the user drags the , but the content view doesn't change until the is released. 在这种情况下，表示的可见内容的偏移量和表示的内容的偏移量，基于位置。In this case, represents the visible content offset and represents the content offset based on the position. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示大量的项会导致性能问题。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 在这种情况下，可能会很有用，若要使用延迟滚动。In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling. 有关详细信息，请参阅[优化性能： 控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md). 此属性可以用作一个实例属性和附加的属性。This property can be used as an instance property and an attached property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示与属性设置为`true`。The following example shows a with the property set to `true`. [!code-xaml[DeferredScrolling#DeferredScrolling](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DeferredScrolling/xaml/window1.xaml#deferredscrolling)]

summary.span: Scrolls the content downward by one line.

span.span: Scrolls the content downward by one line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法不会引起任何滚动行为是`null`。This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if is `null`. 逻辑滚动用于滚动到逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 这不同于物理滚动来按给定方向定义的物理增量滚动内容。This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: Required arguments for this event.

span.span: Required arguments for this event.

summary.span: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.

span.span: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 识别以下键盘输入：The following keyboard input is recognized: - 向左箭头键： 内容滚动到左侧的一行。The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left. - 向右箭头键： 内容滚动到右的一行。The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right. - 向上箭头键： 将内容向上滚动一行。The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line. - 向下箭头键： 将内容向下滚动一行。The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line. - PAGE UP： 滚动内容的当前页的顶部。PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page. - 向下翻页： 将内容向当前页的底部滚动。PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page. - 主页： 滚动内容的第一页的顶部。HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page. - 结束时间： 滚动内容的最后一页的底部。END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double PanningDeceleration { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.PanningDeceleration : double with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.

span.span: Gets or sets the rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.

value.span: 速率减慢 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] / 平方毫秒为单位。

span.span: The rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户滚动通过使用触控，用户将手指放、 一段短距离，在屏幕上移动手指，然后电梯时手指的移动。When a user scrolls the by using touch, the user puts a finger on the , moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving. 此操作的结果是移动在用户抬起手指后将继续。The result of this is that the will continue to move after the user lifts the finger. 属性指定在用户抬起手指后滚动减慢的速率。The property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.

Public Shared ReadOnly PanningDecelerationProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::PanningMode PanningMode { System::Windows::Controls::PanningMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::PanningMode value); };
member this.PanningMode : System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the way reacts to touch manipulation.

span.span: Gets or sets the way reacts to touch manipulation.

value.span: 一个值，指定如何响应触摸操作。

span.span: A value that specifies how reacts to touch manipulation.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否滚动水平、 垂直，或两者。The property specifies whether the scroll horizontally, vertically, or both. 将用户的触摸设备上支持 Windows Touch 上的控件上拖动手指时滚动。The will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch. 可以是任一组是直接在或用作附加属性。 can be either set directly on a or used as an attached property. 当控件包含在其，使用作为附加属性指定的行为中。When a control contains a in its , use as an attached property to specify the behavior of the in the . 当你使用之外，请设置是直接在。When you use a outside of a , set directly on the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建并向其添加多个元素。The following example creates a and adds several elements to it. 在此示例中，窗口的大小发生更改时，大小`textblock1`也会更改。In this example, when the size of the window changes, the size of `textblock1` also changes. 当太小，无法显示的所有内容，变得可滚动。When the is too small to display all of the content, the becomes scrollable. 该示例设置到，以便用户可以滚动水平和垂直通过使用手指。The example sets to so that the user can scroll the horizontally and vertically by using a finger. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeDirect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodedirect)] 下面的示例创建，并使用作为附加属性。The following example creates a and uses as an attached property. 默认情况下中的具有其到。By default the in the of a has its to . 这是，以便当用户在垂直方向移动之前水平移动手指，用户会突出显示文本。This is so that when the user moves a finger horizontally before moving it vertically, the user highlights text. 该示例设置到，以便用户不能通过使用一个手指选择文本。The example sets to so that the user cannot select text by using a finger. 请注意，设置到还会阻止用户选择的文本。Note that setting to also prevents the user from selecting text. 该示例设置属性设置为，因此不需要水平滚动。The example sets the property to , so horizontal scrolling is not necessary. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeAttached](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodeattached)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.

span.span: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.

value.span: 滚动偏移与转换操作偏移的比率。

span.span: The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在对象上拖动手指时，它被视为一个转换操作。When a user drags a finger across an object, it is considered a translate manipulation. 使用此操作向下滚动。The uses that manipulation to scroll. 属性指定多少转换的每个单位滚动。The property specifies how much the scrolls for each unit of translation. 例如，如果为 2，将滚动 2[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]为每个[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]的转换操作。For example, if is 2, the will scroll 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] for every [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] of the translate manipulation.

summary.span: Scrolls horizontally to the beginning of the content.

span.span: Scrolls horizontally to the beginning of the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法不会引起任何滚动行为是`null`。This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if is `null`. 逻辑滚动用于滚动到逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 这不同于物理滚动来按给定方向定义的物理增量滚动内容。This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示大量的项会导致性能问题。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 在这种情况下，可能会很有用，若要使用延迟滚动。In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling. 有关详细信息，请参阅[优化性能： 控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalOffset As Double
public: property double VerticalOffset { double get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.

span.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.

value.span: 一个，表示滚动内容的垂直偏移量。

span.span: A that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个正值对应于页首偏移的内容。A positive value corresponds to the content being offset to the top. 有效值为介于零和减去。Valid values are between zero and the minus the . 如果是`true`的值， ， ，并属性都是数字的项。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items. 如果是`false`，这些属性的值是设备无关的像素。If is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels. 从.NET Framework 版本 3.5 SP1 中，开始时是`true`，不断变化作为用户拖动，但内容视图不会更改直到发布。Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when is `true`, continues to change as the user drags the , but the content view doesn't change until the is released. 在这种情况下，表示的可见内容的偏移量和表示的内容的偏移量，基于位置。In this case, represents the visible content offset and represents the content offset based on the position. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.

value.span: 此属性没有默认值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在视区是内容的可见区域。The viewport is the visible area of the content. 为仅输出属性;通过指定可以有效地设置其内容元素。 is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the of the content element. 如果是`true`的值， ， ，并属性都是数字的项。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items. 如果是`false`，这些属性的值是设备无关的像素。If is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
